amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 115-463 to require the report created by this bill to include "an assessment of the impact and effectiveness of U.S. economic sanctions programs against Iran".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 115-463 to require the report created by this bill to include "an assessment of the impact and effectiveness of U.S. economic sanctions programs against Iran".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Meng.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
